import React, { useState } from "react"; const MyProfile = () => { const [profile, setProfile] = useState({ firstName: "John", lastName: "Doe", phone: "1234567890", email: "john.doe@example.com", address: "", city: "", postalCode: "", country: "India", about: "", }); const [sidebarOpen, setSidebarOpen] = useState(false); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setProfile({ ...profile, [name]: value }); }; const handleUpdate = () => { alert("Profile Updated!"); }; return (
{/* ---------- DASHBOARD HEADER ---------- */}
My Dashboard
{/* Mobile Sidebar Toggle */}
{/* ---------------- LEFT SIDEBAR ---------------- */}
{/* Profile Section */}

John Doe

john.doe@example.com

{/* Menu Buttons */}
{/* Divider */}
{/* ---------------- ADS SEARCH SECTION ---------------- */}
{/* Location */} {/* Categories */} {/* Search Button */}

Edit Profile

); }; export default MyProfile;
